attributes.action: Listen to the people of Wales and stop Labour destroying Wales.
attributes.additional_details:
Welsh labour is refusing to listen to the people they’re paid to represent. 

We have gathered over 220k signatures in a week, and they’re being ignored by Welsh labour.
attributes.background: Listen to the people of Wales and take control as labour are set on destroying our country and refuse to listen to the people their paid to represent. Mark Drakeford is an embarrassment to politics, refuses to accept fact and common sense.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
